85051.「ディエゴ……。\n 今の話 ちゃんと聞いていましたか？\n さあ こちらの方に:
Did you hear what I just said, Diego...?
Come and say hello to this <if_woman>woman<else>man<endif>.

85052.「おっ……俺かよ！！\n そんな かったるいこと\n タッツィにでも やらせれば:
Oh...you're talkin' to me! Why not just let
Tazzi do it?!

85053.「これは すでに タッツィもこなしていること。\n 先輩なら 後輩に手本を示すく:
Tazzi's already has his turn. As a senior, you
should be setting an example for your juniors.

85054.「……あ～ はじめまして。 \n 俺は ディエゴ。趣味は 二度寝と昼寝。\n い:
Ah... Nice to meet ya. I'm Diego. I like
taking naps and...taking more naps. I'm
what you'd call the Master's apprentice.

85055.「……しつけが行き届いておらず すみませんが\n 今から このディエゴに あなた:
I apologize for his lack of discipline.
However, I am going to allow Diego to guide
you through your next trial.

85056.「……えぇと <pc>さんだっけ？\n まあ 俺の案内なら 何も問題ないさ。\n:
Uhhh, <pc>, right? It'll be smooth
sailing with my guidance, so you don't
have to worry about a thing.

85057.「試練は 特別な場所に移動しなきゃならないから\n その気になったら 俺に話しか:
We gotta move to a special place for the
trial, so just come get me when you're
ready to go there.

85058.「……あれ？ なんだか\n シュミの悪い部屋に 来ちまったぞ。:
Huh...? What's up with this shady looking
room?

85060.「この 怪獣プスゴンさまの\n スウィートホームに\n 土足で あがりこみやがっ:
You dare step foot into the sweet home of the
Monster Pusgon?!

85061.「あちゃ～……よりによって\n バケモンの棲みかに 誤爆しちまったか……。:
Ah, darn... Of all places to end up in, it
just had to be a monster's home, didn't it...

85062.「……まぁ 来ちまったもんは しょうがねえ。\n ここで 試練をさせてもらうぜ。:
Well, since we're already here, might as
well. We'll do the trial here.

85063.「何を ゴチャゴチャと……！\n シュミが悪いとか 好き放題 言いやがって！\n:
What's with all the complaining?! Calling my
room shady and talking nonsense! Get ready,
'cause you're gonna regret it!

85064.「……あのさ アンタには悪いけど 今から\n すげえ強い魔物を 呼ばなきゃいけな:
Sorry, but I'm about to call in a pretty
powerful monster. You'd better get outta
here, if you know what's good for you.

85066.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔獣よ……:
Monster from another world who lurks deep
within the abyss...

85067.「おいっ なに唱えてやがる！\n やめてくれっ！: What are you blabbing about now?! Stop that!!

85069.「やめろオォォォーーッ！！\n オレの ウルトラハイセンスな\n インテリアがぁ:
Stop that already!!! You're going to ruin
my ultra sophisticated interior design!!

85071.「オ……オレ ちょっと\n 用事を 思いだしたぜ……。:
I... I just remembered I got somethin'
important to do...

85072.「シメるのは その後にしておいてやる！\n オマエ！ 覚えてろよっ！:
I'll deal with you later! You'd better not
forget about me!

85073.「待たせたな <cs_pchero>！\n さあ 遠慮はいらないぜ。\n 思う存:
Sorry 'bout that, <cs_pchero>!
Alright, don't hold back now! Go on
and show 'em what you're made of!

85074.「よし <cs_pchero>！\n あのバケモンも 出てったままみたいだし\n:
All right! Looks like that big monster's still
gone, so hurry up and take care of this!

85075.「くそっ あの野郎……。\n オレさまの家具に キズひとつでも付けてみろ。\n:
Why, you little... Just try and put even a
single scratch on my furniture! I'll smash
you to bits...!

85077.「……元通り キレイにしておいたぜ。\n こっちの都合で 部屋を荒らしておいて\:
I put everything back how it was before.
It'd be my fault if I left the room a mess,
so I gotta be the one to clean it.

85078.「お オマエ……。\n 最初は イケ好かねえチンピラだと思ったけど\n 案外 い:
Y..you're... I thought you were just some punk
but... You're actually a pretty nice guy...

85079.「おいおい やめろよ。\n ケツが かゆくなってくるぜ。: Hey now, stop that. You're making me blush!

85080.「よくやりました ディエゴ。\n 行き先を間違えた時は どうなることかと\n 思:
Well done, Diego. I was afraid of what might
happen, going to the wrong location and all.
But I can see you managed it well.

85082.「……ずっと ダーマ神殿から\n あなたの動向を 見守っていましたよ。:
I've been watching over everything you've done
from the comfort of the Abbey.

85083.「あなたが思っている以上に 私は あなたの\n 良い所も 悪い所も よく見ている:
I've been observing both your good and your
bad qualities more than you may realize.
You'd do well to remember that...

85085.「そして お見事でした <cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたなら この試練を:
And well done to you, <cs_pchero>.
I had no doubt in my mind that you would
complete this trial.

85086.「このたびは 私の 不出来な教え子の修練に\n 付き合わせてしまいましたが\n:
I apologize that you had to accompany my incompetent student this time. Though, I am sure this was a good learning experience for
him.

85087.「……そちらの方も ご迷惑をおかけしました。\n どうか 師である私の顔に免じて:
I apologize for causing you distress as well.
I hope you can forgive my student's
shortcomings.

85088.「いっ……いやいや そんな！\n インテリアも 無事だったことだし\n そんな:
N...no, no! It's fine! The interior's just
fine, so there's no need to be so formal...

85089.「……さて。お約束した通り 試練に打ち勝った\n あなたの スキルポイントの割り:
Now, as promised, I will now allow you to
allocate up to 130 skill points for completing
this trial.

85090.「上限の解放は ダーマ神殿で おこないます。\n 私は ひとまず先に 失礼いたし:
I can do that for you back at the Abbey.
Please come and speak to me there.

85091.「へへっ なんだ オマエ。\n マスターが相手だと おとなしいんだな？:
Heh heh. What's with you all of a sudden?
My Master got you all scared?

85092.「うっ……うるせー！\n オマエだって あの人には\n 頭が あがらないみたいじ:
S...shut up! You're one to talk! You can
barely speak up to him yourself!!

85093.「……へっ。言ってやがれ！\n 迷惑かけちまったのは 事実だし 今日のとこは\n:
Heh. Say what you want! It's true I did cause
some trouble here, so I'll let your complaints
slide for today.

85094.「さて <cs_pchero>。\n そろそろ ダーマ神殿に戻るとするか！:
Alright, <cs_pchero>. Let's head on back
to Alltrades Abbey!

85095.「……おい。これだけは言っとくけどな。\n 次からは ちゃんと 玄関から入ってこ:
Hey. I will say one thing, though. Next time
you come, do it through the entrance!
That's the polite thing to do, ya know!

87312.「……ちっ わかったよ。 \n やりゃいいんだろ。やりゃあ……。: Yeah, yeah, I got it. Fine, I'll do it...
